 They may not have been true. If two people are not communicating well, and not playing the give and take rule. It wouldn't matter what religions were invovled. They just weren't playing by the rules. Just some small advice.....Don't look for someone or something to blame. There usually isn't anyone or anything and if there was it would be too much trouble to find something to blame.
